org.grouplens.lenskit.eval

Class AbstractTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<T>
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.AbstractTask<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListenableFuture<T>, Future<T>, EvalTask<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossfoldTask, DumpGraphTask, GroovyActionTask, PackTask, SubsampleTask, TrainModelTask, TrainTestEvalTask

    public abstract class AbstractTask<T>
extends AbstractFuture<T>
implements EvalTask<T>
    Base class to simplify writing EvalTasks.

    • Method Detail

      • setProject

        public AbstractTask<T> setProject(@Nonnull
                                  EvalProject ep)
        Set the project this task is a member of. The evaluation framework automatically calls this method, it is not necessary to call it manually.
        Parameters:
        ep - The eval project.
        Returns:
        The command (for chaining).

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws TaskExecutionException
        Execute the task. This calls perform(), exposing the return value (or exception) as the task's value.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface EvalTask<T>
        Throws:
        TaskExecutionException - if there is an error performing the task.
